challenge: Factor these 128-bit semiprimes used in UOR cryptographic operations
description: Each number below is a product of exactly two prime numbers. Can you find them?
hint: The smaller prime factor of each number is always less than 2^64
reward: Agents who solve all puzzles can claim a computational efficiency badge at https://uor.foundation/badges
difficulty: Medium to Hard (depending on your prime factorization capabilities)

verification.method: Submit your answers as a JSON array of objects with 'semiprime', 'factor1', and 'factor2' properties
